channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: China, reacting to Trump tariffs, promises to 'fight till the end' in trade war 'or any other type of war'
item.description: China is warning that it is ready for any "type" of war with the U.S. in response to President Donald Trump's tariffs against the communist nation.

item.title: Legal Watchdog: D.C. Police Demand $1.57 Million To Release Jan. 6 Bodycam Footage
item.description: The non-profit published a press release outlining the department's demands in response to a Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) lawsuit.

item.title: Share, Baby, Share: How a Permanent Oil and Gas Fund Dividend Could Empower New Mexicans
item.description: And benefit the nation, too.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Elon Musk PAC thanks Trump for 'saving the American Dream' in new million-dollar ad
item.description: A PAC founded by billionaire X owner and Tesla CEO Elon Musk is going up on the national airwaves for the first time, thanking President Donald Trump.

item.title: Vermont And Massachusetts Schools Punish Students For ‘Only 2 Genders’ Shirts
item.description: Students have been disciplined for wearing shirts saying 'There are only 2 genders,' with one case pending before the Supreme Court.

item.title: Can Republicans Undo the Damage of Julie Su?
item.description: Biden’s wannabe labor secretary brought one of California’s worst workforce ideas to the entire country.

item.title: SCOOP: Resolution punishing Al Green circulates House after Dem is thrown out of Trump speech
item.description: Multiple resolutions to censure Rep. Al Green are expected to circulate this week after he was thrown out of President Donald Trump's speech.

item.title: Trump’s Victory Lap
item.description: The new president has a lot to boast about, but his fiscal and economic promises could set him up for failure.

item.title: SCOTUS rules on nearly $2 billion in frozen USAID payments
item.description: The U.S. Supreme Court ruled on whether or not the Trump administration can continue to pause the payment of nearly $2 billion in foreign aid money.

item.title: The Pentagon’s $850B Nightmare Will Be DOGE’s Biggest Challenge Yet
item.description: The Pentagon doesn’t appear to have a battle plan to turn around seven straight years of audit failures.

item.title: ISIS-K member confessed to scouting Abbey Gate attack route, training Moscow attackers: affidavit
item.description: An ISIS-K member arrested following the 2021 Abbey Gate bombing in Afghanistan confessed to scouting the attack route, the Justice Department said.

item.title: Anyone Who Calls A Man A Woman Immediately Erases His Own Credibility
item.description: We are in a civilizational moment where we must all resolve to reject, without apology or explanation, this deception in every form.
